select
distinct
from T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA LEFT JOIN T_CRM_PROVINCE P ON P.FID = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FPROVINCEID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_CITY C ON C.FID = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FCITYID
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA LEFT JOIN T_CRM_PROVINCE P ON P.FID = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FPROVINCEID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_CITY C ON C.FID = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FCITYID where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA
FID = #{record.fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCREATETIME = #{record.fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCREATEUSERID = #{record.fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTUPDATETIME = #{record.flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{record.flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCUSTNAME = #{record.fcustname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCUSTNUMBER = #{record.fcustnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FSIMPLENAME = #{record.fsimplename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDEGREE = #{record.fdegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCUSTTYPE = #{record.fcusttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FTAXREGNUMBER = #{record.ftaxregnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FISTRANGOODS = #{record.fistrangoods,jdbcType=CHAR},
FISREDEEMPOINTS = #{record.fisredeempoints,jdbcType=CHAR},
FISIMPORTCUSTOR = #{record.fisimportcustor,jdbcType=CHAR},
FAREAID = #{record.fareaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FDEPTID = #{record.fdeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FTRADEID = #{record.ftradeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCOMPANYPROPERTY = #{record.fcompanyproperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREMARK = #{record.fremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCOMPANYSCOP = #{record.fcompanyscop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLASTYEARINCOME = #{record.flastyearincome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTYEARPROFIT = #{record.flastyearprofit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FISACCEPTMARKET = #{record.fisacceptmarket,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPROCREDIT = #{record.fprocredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPARENTCOMPANYID = #{record.fparentcompanyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCHANNEL = #{record.fchannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONTACTID = #{record.fcontactid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCUSTSTATUS = #{record.fcuststatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRESPONSIBILLITY = #{record.fresponsibillity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FVERSIONNUMBER = #{record.fversionnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPROVINCE = #{record.fprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCITY = #{record.fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCOMPADDR = #{record.fcompaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBRANDWORTH = #{record.fbrandworth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBILLTITLE = #{record.fbilltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCUSTNATURE = #{record.fcustnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FPREFERENCESERVICE = #{record.fpreferenceservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCHANNELSOURCE = #{record.fchannelsource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FISFOCUSPAY = #{record.fisfocuspay,jdbcType=CHAR},
FFOCUSDEPTID = #{record.ffocusdeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREGISTERFUND = #{record.fregisterfund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FISPARENTCOMPANY = #{record.fisparentcompany,jdbcType=CHAR},
FADDRTYPE = #{record.faddrtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRECOMMENDCUST = #{record.frecommendcust,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FPROVINCEID = #{record.fprovinceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCITYID = #{record.fcityid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FISSPECIAL = #{record.fisspecial,jdbcType=CHAR},
FPARENTNUMBER = #{record.fparentnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FFOCUSDEPTNAME = #{record.ffocusdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREGISTADDRESS = #{record.fregistaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FBRANDWORTH = #{record.fbrandworth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBILLTITLE = #{record.fbilltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCUSTNATURE = #{record.fcustnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPREFERENCESERVICE = #{record.fpreferenceservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCHANNELSOURCE = #{record.fchannelsource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FISFOCUSPAY = #{record.fisfocuspay,jdbcType=CHAR}, FFOCUSDEPTID = #{record.ffocusdeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREGISTERFUND = #{record.fregisterfund,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FISPARENTCOMPANY = #{record.fisparentcompany,jdbcType=CHAR}, FADDRTYPE = #{record.faddrtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRECOMMENDCUST = #{record.frecommendcust,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPROVINCEID = #{record.fprovinceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCITYID = #{record.fcityid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FISSPECIAL = #{record.fisspecial,jdbcType=CHAR}, FPARENTNUMBER = #{record.fparentnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFOCUSDEPTNAME = #{record.ffocusdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREGISTADDRESS = #{record.fregistaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA
FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCREATEUSERID = #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCUSTNAME = #{fcustname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCUSTNUMBER = #{fcustnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FSIMPLENAME = #{fsimplename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FCUSTTYPE = #{fcusttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FTAXREGNUMBER = #{ftaxregnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FISTRANGOODS = #{fistrangoods,jdbcType=CHAR},
FISREDEEMPOINTS = #{fisredeempoints,jdbcType=CHAR},
FISIMPORTCUSTOR = #{fisimportcustor,jdbcType=CHAR},
FAREAID = #{fareaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FDEPTID = #{fdeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FTRADEID = #{ftradeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCOMPANYPROPERTY = #{fcompanyproperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREMARK = #{fremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCOMPANYSCOP = #{fcompanyscop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLASTYEARINCOME = #{flastyearincome,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTYEARPROFIT = #{flastyearprofit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FISACCEPTMARKET = #{fisacceptmarket,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPROCREDIT = #{fprocredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPARENTCOMPANYID = #{fparentcompanyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCHANNEL = #{fchannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONTACTID = #{fcontactid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCUSTSTATUS = #{fcuststatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRESPONSIBILLITY = #{fresponsibillity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FVERSIONNUMBER = #{fversionnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPROVINCE = #{fprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCITY = #{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCOMPADDR = #{fcompaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBRANDWORTH = #{fbrandworth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBILLTITLE = #{fbilltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCUSTNATURE = #{fcustnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FPREFERENCESERVICE = #{fpreferenceservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCHANNELSOURCE = #{fchannelsource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FISFOCUSPAY = #{fisfocuspay,jdbcType=CHAR},
FFOCUSDEPTID = #{ffocusdeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREGISTERFUND = #{fregisterfund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA set FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATEUSERID = #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCUSTNAME = #{fcustname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCUSTNUMBER = #{fcustnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSIMPLENAME = #{fsimplename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDEGREE = #{fdegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCUSTTYPE = #{fcusttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FTAXREGNUMBER = #{ftaxregnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FISTRANGOODS = #{fistrangoods,jdbcType=CHAR}, FISREDEEMPOINTS = #{fisredeempoints,jdbcType=CHAR}, FISIMPORTCUSTOR = #{fisimportcustor,jdbcType=CHAR}, FAREAID = #{fareaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDEPTID = #{fdeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FTRADEID = #{ftradeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCOMPANYPROPERTY = #{fcompanyproperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREMARK = #{fremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCOMPANYSCOP = #{fcompanyscop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLASTYEARINCOME = #{flastyearincome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTYEARPROFIT = #{flastyearprofit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FISACCEPTMARKET = #{fisacceptmarket,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FPROCREDIT = #{fprocredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FPARENTCOMPANYID = #{fparentcompanyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCHANNEL = #{fchannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTACTID = #{fcontactid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCUSTSTATUS = #{fcuststatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRESPONSIBILLITY = #{fresponsibillity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FVERSIONNUMBER = #{fversionnumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPROVINCE = #{fprovince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCITY = #{fcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCOMPADDR = #{fcompaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBRANDWORTH = #{fbrandworth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBILLTITLE = #{fbilltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCUSTNATURE = #{fcustnature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPREFERENCESERVICE = #{fpreferenceservice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCHANNELSOURCE = #{fchannelsource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FISFOCUSPAY = #{fisfocuspay,jdbcType=CHAR}, FFOCUSDEPTID = #{ffocusdeptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREGISTERFUND = #{fregisterfund,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FISPARENTCOMPANY = #{fisparentcompany,jdbcType=CHAR}, FADDRTYPE = #{faddrtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRECOMMENDCUST = #{frecommendcust,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FPROVINCEID = #{fprovinceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCITYID = #{fcityid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FISSPECIAL = #{fisspecial,jdbcType=CHAR}, FPARENTNUMBER = #{fparentnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFOCUSDEPTNAME = #{ffocusdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREGISTADDRESS = #{fregistaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select P.FNAME FPROVINCE,C.FNAME FCITY,
from T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA LEFT JOIN T_CRM_PROVINCE P ON P.FID = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FPROVINCEID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_CITY C ON C.FID = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FCITYID where FCUSTNUMBER = #{fcustnumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select P.FNAME FPROVINCE,C.FNAME FCITY,
,t_org_department.fstandardcode as fdeptidStandardcode,DEPART.fstandardcode AS MARKETINGDEPT, T_CUST_MARKETDEPT.FALLOTTIME AS MARKETINGALLOTTIME,T_CUST_MARKETDEPT.FCREATETIME AS MARKETINGCREATETIME, T_AUTH_USER.FEMPCODE AS MARKETINGCREATEUSER from T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA join t_org_department on t_org_department.fid = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.Fdeptid LEFT JOIN T_CUST_MARKETDEPT on T_CUST_MARKETDEPT.FCUSTID=T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FID LEFT JOIN T_ORG_DEPARTMENT DEPART ON T_CUST_MARKETDEPT.FDEPTID=DEPART.FID LEFT JOIN T_AUTH_USER ON T_CUST_MARKETDEPT.FCREATEUSERID=T_AUTH_USER.FID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_PROVINCE P ON P.FID = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FPROVINCEID LEFT JOIN T_CRM_CITY C ON C.FID = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FCITYID where T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.FCUSTSTATUS in('0','2')
select C.fname from T_CRM_CITY C where C.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select p.fname from T_CRM_PROVINCE P where p.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select C.fnumber from T_CRM_CITY C where C.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select p.fnumber from T_CRM_PROVINCE P where p.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT CUSTBASE.FCUSTNAME,CUSTBASE.FCUSTNUMBER,CUSTBASE.FCREATETIME, DECODE(CUSTBASE.FCUSTSTATUS,2,0,1) FCUSTSTATUS, CUSTBASE.FLASTUPDATETIME, ORG.FDEPTNAME,ORG.FSTANDARDCODE,CUSTPREFER.FADDRESS, LINKMAIN.FLAT,LINKMAIN.FLNG, CUSTBASE.FDEGREE FDEGREE, (SELECT SUM(NVL(T.FFPREPAYAMOUNT,0)+NVL(T.FARRIVEDAOUNT,0)-NVL(T.FREFUNDRABATE,0)-NVL(T.FAGENTRECEIVEPAY,0)) FROM T_CRM_CUSTANALYSEBYDAY T WHERE T.FCANALYSETYPE = 1 AND T.FYEAR = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYY') AND T.FMONTH = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'MM') AND T.FCUSTID = CUSTBASE.FID ) DELIVERMONEY FROM T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA CUSTBASE LEFT JOIN T_ORG_DEPARTMENT ORG ON ORG.FID=CUSTBASE.FDEPTID AND ORG.FSTATUS=1 LEFT JOIN T_CUST_CUSTLINKMAN LINKMAIN ON LINKMAIN.FCUSTID= CUSTBASE.FID AND LINKMAIN.FISMAINLINKMAN=1 AND LINKMAIN.FSTATUS=0 LEFT JOIN T_CUST_PREFERENCEADDRESS CUSTPREFER ON CUSTPREFER.FLINKMANID=LINKMAIN.FID AND CUSTPREFER.FISMAINADDRESS=1 AND CUSTPREFER.FSTATUS=0
WHERE CUSTBASE.FID=#{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
